name: Prometheus's Pizza
description: In this action packed, yet delicate 2D platformer game you must try and get a pizza to the customer. Set in a fictional world where delivering a pizza through a dungeon isn’t out of the norm. You must use the unique ability to control gravitational states at your will to deliver Prometheus his pie while keeping it from falling to the ground. Beware of obstacles and traps in your path. Death is almost inevitable, but the pizza delivery people of the world have been gifted the ability to respawn so the rulers can get their food without having to leave their lairs.
